items.title: SignSight: ASL Translator with Computer Vision
items.description: 1st place Winner at CruzHacks 2024. Mobile app that translates American Sign Language (ASL) using computer vision and LSTMs. Trained and recorded dataset ourselves!

items.title: 9-bit CPU in SystemVerilog
items.description: 9-bit CPU for IEEE 16 bit floating point type conversion and arithmetic operations. Designed custom ISA that only 'jumps forward.' Simulated with ModelSim and assembler in Python.

items.title: Snek2
items.description: Compiler for a Python-like language with type inference, closures, and first-class functions. Compiles to x86 assembly via LLVM-IR.

items.title: Toopy
items.description: CNNs written from scratch in C/C++ and OpenCL. Implemented im2col for memory coalescing and CLBlast Batched GEMM.

items.title: FishSense AutoLabel
items.description: Automated low-latency head tail labeling tool for diverse fish images. Convex hull + shape analysis for fish detection, with accuracy + speed metrics.

items.title: SigPytch
items.description: Open source PyPi Python library for financial forcasting and metrics. Used to support our student-led investment fund and their pitches to CFA judges on stock analysis.

items.title: On-site vs Off-site Solar at UCSD
items.description: Bonnie Reiss Fellowship for exploring solar cost and production at UCSD for the 2024 Salas O'Brien study.

items.title: Eutrophication in Orange County: LEGO Spectrophotometer
items.description: 1st place for Beckman Legacy Award scholarship. LEGO-based spectrophotometer for measuring water quality in OC.
